name: MusheeLink
description:
A small game (made at the Global Game Jam 2023).

 Starting from the mother mushrom, connect the dots by dragging (or with the mouse) to try and get the mushee child to the goal

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

Mouse/drag - connect the dots

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In each level, start from the big mushroom and connect a dot from each circle to another available circle to make the small mushee child move to the next node. It starts easy but gets a bit trickier later on

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our Team:
